patterns.name: overall_performance
patterns.regex: \bjak se nam vede\b|\bjak se nám vede\b|\bjak se dari\b|\bjak se nám daří\b

patterns.name: overall_status
patterns.regex: \bjak jsme na tom\b|\bjak jsme na tom celkove\b|\bjak na tom jsme\b

patterns.name: downward_trend_reason
patterns.regex: \bproc jdeme dolu\b|\bproc jdeme dolů\b|\bproc klesame\b|\bproč klesáme\b|\bproc klesa(me)?\b|\bproč jdeme dolů\b

patterns.name: revenue_down_reason
patterns.regex: \bproc (nam )?padaji trzby\b|\bproc klesaji trzby\b|\bproc jdou trzby dolu\b

patterns.name: margin_down_reason
patterns.regex: \bproc klesa marze\b|\bproc jde marze dolu\b|\bproc je marze nizsi\b

patterns.name: who_is_churning
patterns.regex: \bkdo nam odchazi\b|\bkdo nám odchází\b|\bkdo odchazi\b|\bkdo odchází\b

patterns.name: who_churns_most
patterns.replacement_en: which customers are churning the most?

patterns.name: best_worst_regions
patterns.regex: \bkde se nam dari nejlepe\b|\bkde se nam dari nejhur\b|\bktery region je nejlepsi\b|\bktery region je nejhorsi\b
patterns.replacement_en: which regions perform best and worst?

patterns.name: top_products_up
patterns.regex: \bktere produkty rostou\b|\bktery produkt roste nejvic\b|\bco roste nejvic\b
patterns.replacement_en: which products are growing the most?

patterns.name: top_products_down
patterns.regex: \bktere produkty klesaji\b|\bktery produkt pada nejvic\b|\bco klesa nejvic\b
patterns.replacement_en: which products are declining the most?

patterns.name: compare_period
patterns.regex: \bjak jsme proti loni\b|\boproti loni\b|\boproti minulemu mesici\b|\boproti minulemu kvartalu\b
patterns.replacement_en: compare current period versus last period

patterns.name: drivers_up
patterns.regex: \bco nas taha nahoru\b|\bco taha rust\b|\bco to taha nahoru\b|\bco zveda trzby\b

patterns.name: drivers_down
patterns.regex: \bco nas taha dolu\b|\bco taha dolu\b|\bco srazi vykon\b|\bco brzdi rust\b
